sourcesContent:
export const editions = {
  green: {
    name: "Monster OG Green",
    model: "/Models/black_monster_energy_drink.glb",
    bg: "#000000",
    headingColor: "#00ff41",
    textColor: "#ffffff",
    logoColor: "#00ff41",
    buttonColor: "#00ff41",
    navColor: "#ffffff", // ðŸ‘ˆ add this
    footerColor: "#ffffff", // ðŸ‘ˆ add this
    description:
      "Crack open Monster OGâ€”bold citrus flavor, smooth refreshment, and 160mg of caffeine to fuel your fire. Unleash the beast",
  },
  white: {
    name: "Monster Ultra White",
    model: "/Models/monster_zero-white-_ultra.glb",
    bg: "#f5f5f5",
    headingColor: "#111111",
    textColor: "#000000",
    logoColor: "#111111",
    buttonColor: "#ffffff",
    navColor: "#000000", // ðŸ‘ˆ black text for visibility
    footerColor: "#000000", // ðŸ‘ˆ black text for visibility
    description:
      "Monster Ultra breaks the rules with crisp citrus, zero sugar. Clean energy to keep the good times rolling.",
  },
  mango: {
    name: "Mango Loco",
    model: "/Models/monster_energy_drink_mango_flavor.glb",
    bg: "#ff7b00",
    headingColor: "#ffb347",
    textColor: "#ffffff",
    logoColor: "#ff7b00",
    buttonColor: "#ff7b00",
    navColor: "#ffffff",
    footerColor: "#ffffff",
    description:
      "Mango Locoâ€™s juicy tropical blend hits day or night. Zero sugar, 10 calories, and a smooth, vibrant flavor thatâ€™s all its own",
  },
  pink: {
    name: "Pipeline Punch",
    model: "/Models/monsterpp.glb",
    bg: "#ED9AAE",
    headingColor: "#E5748F",
    textColor: "#ffffff",
    logoColor: "#ff007f",
    buttonColor: "#ff007f",
    navColor: "#ffffff",
    footerColor: "#ffffff",
    description:
      "Pipeline Punch is crafted with blend of flavors for a whole new experience. Zero Sugar, 10 calories, bright, and sweet!",
  },
};
